text: Jan Povýšil is a Czech Paralympic swimmer. He has competed in four Paralympic games, from 2000 through 2012. He competes in the S4 class, and has won five bronze medals in freestyle events. ==References== Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for the Czech Republic Category:Living people Category:Swimmers at the 2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Swimmers at the 2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Swimmers at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Swimmers at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Swimmers at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic swimmers of the Czech Republic Category:S4-classified Paralympic swimmers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic medalists in swimming
title: Jan Povýšil
